name: Leech Demon
description: The Leech Demon is a Large chaotic evil fiend known for its blood-draining abilities and resides in dark waters. It has a formidable presence with tentacles and robust skills for combat.
memorable: Its ability to drain life force with tentacles while gaining temporary hit points makes it a dangerous adversary.
goals: Hunting living creatures to drain their blood and sustain itself.
relations: May be encountered alongside other dark fiends or aquatic creatures.
environment: Dark aquatic environments, such as swamps, ponds, or oceans.
strengths: Possesses amphibious nature, allowing it to thrive in both water and air, along with skills in combat.
weaknesses: Low Charisma score, making it poor in social interactions.
attacks: Can perform multiple attacks with bites and tentacle bites, dealing significant piercing and necrotic damage.
most_powerful_ability: Release Swarm allows it to summon a leech swarm that acts as an ally and provides additional temporary hit points.
senses: Possesses blood sense, allowing it to detect creatures by scent within 30 feet, enhancing its hunting capabilities.
skills: Has a perception skill bonus of +1.
additional_information: Blood draining ability provides temporary hit points.
Magic Resistance grants advantage on saving throws against spells.
Tentacle Bite restrains targets and inflicts ongoing blood loss damage.
Can detach its tentacles as a bonus action.
Maintain only one leech swarm at a time during combat.
test_queries: demon that drains blood and lives in water
Large fiend with tentacles and blood sense
insidious amphibious creature from dark waters
